div.p: I'm Brian Simons, ACCESS student at DeSales University.
I was a Management Major, BA in Management.
I've been employed by Verizon Communications for the last 20 years.
I have a technical job with them.
I work in provisioning data, video, and voice circuits for residential and business customers.
I have two children-a 9-year old son and a 6-year old daughter.
